edu.millersville.cs.segfault.model

Class XMLAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.millersville.cs.segfault.model.XMLAttribute

  • public class XMLAttribute
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of static methods for serializing and de-serializing objects to XML.
    Author:
    Daniel Rabiega
